p: In addition to the IgG anti-stalk response, we also monitored the serum IgA anti-stalk response (Fig. 4b). The serum IgA response followed a similar trend as the serum IgG response albeit at a lower magnitude. We also measured the anamnestic mucosal IgA anti-stalk response in day 3 post challenge nasal washes and found a similar pattern compared to serum IgA titers (Fig. 4c).
